New Records: Evin Lewis scored an unbeaten 102 off 61 balls, his fifth ODI century
Key Match Events: Evin Lewis hit a straight six to bring up the winning runs
West Indies reached 196-2 in reply to Sri Lanka's 156-3
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies secured a consolation victory against series winners Sri Lanka
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was reduced to 23 overs per side due to a five-hour rain delay
Evin Lewis played through even after rolling his left ankle on 51
Others: West Indies won the series, but the article does not provide further details
